mapper.select: select id, companyname, img, yingyezhizhaohao, faren, phonenumber, jingyingfanwei, address, zhuceshijian, createtime, updatetime, status, createid from company where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into company(companyname, img, yingyezhizhaohao, faren, phonenumber, jingyingfanwei, address, zhuceshijian, createtime, updatetime, status, createid) values (#{companyname}, #{img}, #{yingyezhizhaohao}, #{faren}, #{phonenumber}, #{jingyingfanwei}, #{address}, #{zhuceshijian}, now(), now(), #{status}, #{createid})

insert into company(companyname, img, yingyezhizhaohao, faren, phonenumber, jingyingfanwei, address, zhuceshijian, createtime, updatetime, status, createid) values
(#{entity.companyname}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.yingyezhizhaohao}, #{entity.faren}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.jingyingfanwei}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.zhuceshijian}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createid})

insert into company(companyname, img, yingyezhizhaohao, faren, phonenumber, jingyingfanwei, address, zhuceshijian, createtime, updatetime, status, createid) values
(#{entity.companyname}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.yingyezhizhaohao}, #{entity.faren}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.jingyingfanwei}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.zhuceshijian}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createid})
on duplicate key update companyname = values(companyname), img = values(img), yingyezhizhaohao = values(yingyezhizhaohao), faren = values(faren), phonenumber = values(phonenumber), jingyingfanwei = values(jingyingfanwei), address = values(address), zhuceshijian = values(zhuceshijian), createtime = values(createtime), updatetime = values(updatetime), status = values(status), createid = values(createid)
mapper.update:
update company
companyname = #{companyname},
img = #{img},
yingyezhizhaohao = #{yingyezhizhaohao},
faren = #{faren},
phonenumber = #{phonenumber},
jingyingfanwei = #{jingyingfanwei},
address = #{address},
zhuceshijian = #{zhuceshijian},
createtime = #{createtime},
updatetime = now(),
status = #{status},
createid = #{createid},
where id = #{id}
